message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1000000. It's a unique opportunity, and I believe it will be highly valuable to your business. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, my budget allows me to pay up to $950000 for it. Would you consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still aiming for a price closer to my initial ask. I'm willing to come down to $975000.  This is a fair price considering the value this product will bring to your business. What do you think?
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to go up to $960000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
